trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_SEQ_00<tab>Gulool Ja wishes to go and collect his flower for the funeral.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Gossan at Praxis Park.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_WUKLAMAT_000_001<tab>Papa always said he didn't want a somber funeral, so we celebrated his life together with our victory. I'm sure he would've loved it...
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_WUKLAMAT_000_002<tab>I like to think he was watching us from the world beyond, filling his cup every time we filled our own.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_ALPHINAUD_000_005<tab>Although I've been in the Backroom before, there was no time to see the sights. I should like to take a closer look at the equipment.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_ALISAIE_000_010<tab>It's a relief to see that Gulool Ja is doing well. He's been through too much for one so young.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_KRILE_000_015<tab>From a group that plotted to undermine a tyrant king from the shadows to one that aids their fellow citizens in the open... Oblivion has come a long way.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GRAHATIA_000_020<tab>For the people to take it on themselves to organize and hold the funeral... It speaks to their enduring love for Sphene.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GULOOLJA_000_040<tab>The flowers are being handed out at Praxis Park. I'm thinking of heading over there now.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_WUKLAMAT_000_041<tab>We'll join you. There's a man I would like to speak with─Gossan. He was apparently Sphene's aide, and the one who sent us the invitation.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_WUKLAMAT_000_042<tab>Come on, let's go.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_WUKLAMAT_000_045<tab>All correspondence was being handled by the Wing of Reflection, so this is my first time speaking with Gossan.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GULOOLJA_000_050<tab>Here he is. Gossan.

TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_ALPHINAUD_000_055<tab>Wuk Lamat's attendance will surely help strengthen relations between the two nations. I get the strong impression that both Tuliyollal and Alexandria wish to put this tragic past behind them.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_ALISAIE_000_060<tab>Judging from all the activity, I presume the funeral will be held here.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_KRILE_000_065<tab>While it appears souls are still being issued, supply must be limited now that they're no longer being harvested. The grim faces in the queue tell the tale.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GRAHATIA_000_070<tab>It makes sense that Sphene had loyal aides such as Gossan, given how much time she dedicated to walking among her people.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GOSSAN_000_100<tab>Why, you're...
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_WUKLAMAT_000_101<tab>I'm Vow Wuk Lamat of Tuliyollal. Thank you for extending us an invitation to Queen Sphene's funeral.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GOSSAN_000_102<tab>We are honored, truly. I had seen you before from a distance, but never had the pleasure.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GOSSAN_000_103<tab>I am Gossan, former chief aide to the queen. Since her passing, I have been responsible for administering affairs of state.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GULOOLJA_000_104<tab>Um, can we get our flowers here?
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GOSSAN_000_105<tab>Yes, Your Majesty. The flowers are being handed out at the counter yonder, alongside the regulators.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_WUKLAMAT_000_106<tab>What? We need to wear regulators for the funeral?
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GOSSAN_000_107<tab>Ah, rest assured they are not a requirement. We're aware your people do not use them.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GOSSAN_000_108<tab>You see, people in the Alexandria of old wore tokens of mourning upon their persons when attending funerals.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GOSSAN_000_109<tab>As such tokens were black, it was suggested that we might wear regulators painted the same color.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GOSSAN_000_110<tab>We've yet to produce enough for everyone, but we're distributing them as we are able.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_WUKLAMAT_000_111<tab>I see...
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GOSSAN_000_112<tab>Yet regulator or no, the important thing is that we remember Queen Sphene. Remember her and her kindness as you make an offering of your flower.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_WUKLAMAT_000_113<tab>I will.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GOSSAN_000_114<tab>The proceedings will soon begin in this plaza. Please take your place once you have your flower.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GULOOLJA_000_115<tab>I'm sorry. I shouldn't have brought that up...
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_ALPHINAUD_000_120<tab>I hope the altar can provide comfort to those who need it.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_ALISAIE_000_125<tab>Seeing that child reminded me of myself. Of how hard it was for me to accept that Grandfather was gone.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_ALISAIE_000_130<tab>But that sadness is what gave me the strength to come this far, and I would never choose to forget it. Never.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_KRILE_000_135<tab>This seems a good place to continue our conversation.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GRAHATIA_000_140<tab>Simply leaving Alexandria won't solve all their problems, I fear. The problem runs deeper than that.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_WUKLAMAT_000_200<tab>Hey, Gulool Ja? Do you really know nothing at all about your mother?
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GULOOLJA_000_201<tab>Shale searched the system for information on residents, but the only Mamool Ja she found listed were my father and me.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GULOOLJA_000_202<tab>Even if she died and was erased from people's memories, she should've been there. But she wasn't...
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_WUKLAMAT_000_203<tab>Well, that you're here means she was here too, inside the dome. There can't be any other way about it.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_A1_000_001<tab>Perhaps we should try looking again.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_A1_000_002<tab>Do you want to know your mother?
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GULOOLJA_000_205<tab>Maybe... It's hard to explain. I'm not sad, but I feel like...like I'm missing something.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GULOOLJA_000_206<tab>So even if it makes me feel sad, I want to know my mother.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GULOOLJA_000_207<tab>I think so. Even if it makes me feel sad, I want to know her.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GULOOLJA_000_208<tab>So I want to try looking again. And if I don't find anything this time, I'll give up.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_WUKLAMAT_000_209<tab>I see... Well, if that's what you want...
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_WUKLAMAT_050_209<tab>...Then I'll help you!
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_KRILE_100_209<tab>I'd like to help as well, and I believe I speak for the others too.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GULOOLJA_000_210<tab>But...I can't bother you with this. You already came for the funeral...
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GRAHATIA_100_211<tab>We came here not only for the funeral, but to see whether all was well in Alexandria. We're not about to leave just yet.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_KRILE_100_213<tab>Besides, in seeking to learn about your mother, we're bound to learn about your father as well.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_KRILE_100_214<tab>By retracing the steps of this man who kept his own counsel, we may gain knowledge that can serve the people of Alexandria.
TEXT_KINGMG102_05245_GULOOLJA_000_215<tab>...Alright. Thank you, everyone!
